comment: aromatase, ARO following after R01840 subsequently R02351
definition: 19-Hydroxyandrost-4-ene-3,17-dione + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 19-Oxoandrost-4-ene-3,17-dione + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O
name: 19-hydroxyandrostenedione,NADPH---hemoprotein reductase:oxygen 19-oxidoreductase
